data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Baise, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baise, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,881 believers in Baise to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Baise. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Baise, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Zhuang, Yang people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Zhuang, Yang people know you.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 82,354 who are far from you in Baise, Guangxi, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Baise to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.section_summary:
the county of Baise, Guangxi, China has a population of 90,700.

We estimate Baise has 6,881 people who might know Jesus, 1,465 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,354 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 90,700 people living in the county of Baise.
